This dress looks nice in the picture, but what arrived was made from a poorly cut pattern. It's basically two panels, front and back, but for some reason, the back panel was cut twice as wide as the front, so the garment is uneven on the body. The we the sleeves are cut and sewn to the rest of the garment is very poor, too wide, and too far down the length of the gown. It is sewn so when you raise your hands above your head, the rest of the gown is pulled up as well, at least several inches. Very disappointed in this purchase.
